sources.title: LoveNest
sources.description: Love Nest, The / Frigo kapitánem (1923) info: CSFD IMDB Directed by: Edward F. Cline ; Buster Keaton Cast: Buster Keaton ; Joe Roberts ; Virginia Fox

sources.title: Buster Keaton's "The Love Nest" (1923)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     "The Love Nest" is a short comedy starring Buster Keaton and featuring Joe Roberts, a star of Silent Hall of Fame.  Directed by               Buster Keaton Produced by             Buster Keaton Productions Scenario by               Buster Keaton           Starring                     Buster Keaton, Joe Roberts Cinematography        Elgin Lessley Distributed by           Associated First National Pictures Release date               March 1923 Running time             19 min. Country                      United States Language                    Silent film, English intertitles Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

metadata.Plot: Buster bids goodbye to Virginia and all women, sailing away in his "Cupid." Later, without food or water, he is taken on board "The Love Nest" which has a very mean captain. A crewman who spills coffee on the captain's hand is thrown overboard. So is anyone else who bothers the captain.
metadata.Actors: Buster Keaton, Joe Roberts, Virginia Fox
